trans-unit.source: Represents a column header for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um cabeçalho de coluna para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnHeader object is a button control that is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de GridViewColumnHeader é um controlo de botão que é derivado de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: GridViewColumnHeader properties keep track of mouse events and the resizing of columns.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de GridViewColumnHeader manter controlar dos eventos de rato e o redimensionamento de colunas.

trans-unit.source: Column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode are GridViewColumnHeader objects.
trans-unit.target: Cabeçalhos de coluna num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>modo de visualização são objetos de GridViewColumnHeader.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can customize GridViewColumnHeader objects by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: Pode personalizar objetos GridViewColumnHeader utilizando uma variedade de propriedades que se encontram desta classe e classes relacionadas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre estas propriedades e sobre a precedência entre eles, consulte [estilos de cabeçalho de coluna de GridView e descrição geral de modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnHeader is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: É um GridViewColumnHeader um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, o que significa que pode conter um único objeto de qualquer tipo (como uma cadeia, uma imagem ou um painel).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> que se encontra associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Responde quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref> é premido.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos de evento.

trans-unit.source: Responds to the creation of the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Responde a criação da árvore visual para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and updates the floating version of the header when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>.
trans-unit.target: Este método define o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>e atualiza a versão do cabeçalho flutuante quando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"> </xref> eventos para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event when a column is changing its position.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação não elevar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>evento quando uma coluna está a alterar o respetiva posição.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: Provides an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> implementação para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"> </xref> eventos para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> implementation of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> clears mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>implementação <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A>apaga captura do rato.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação não altera a <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref> event when the user pauses the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"> </xref> eventos quando o utilizador interrompe o ponteiro do rato no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and its column to a new location in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação processa a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>eventos quando o utilizador arrasta uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>e respetiva coluna de uma nova localização um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>utilizando o rato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o evento, o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> event when the mouse moves off the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"> </xref> eventos quando o rato se move o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> with the mouse from its old location, to move the header and its column.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação processa a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>eventos quando o utilizador arrasta uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>com o rato da localização antiga para mover o cabeçalho e respetiva coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar o evento, o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref> eventos quando o utilizador prime o botão esquerdo do rato ao colocar em pausa o ponteiro do rato no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação processa a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>eventos, para que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>pode suportar a operação de arrastar e largar que se move de uma coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: This method captures the mouse and sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este capturas do método do rato e define o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>para o argumento do evento `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event when the user releases the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"> </xref> eventos quando o utilizador liberta o botão esquerdo do rato ao colocar em pausa o ponteiro do rato no <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event (which occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação processa a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>evento (que ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>está definido como `true`).</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: It also ends the mouse capture that was set by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Termina a captura do rato que foi definida pelo também o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: This provides a way for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: Isto fornece uma forma do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para suportar a operação de arrastar e largar que se move de uma coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este método define o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>para o argumento do evento `true`.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event that occurs when the user moves the mouse within a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a classe de processamento para a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> eventos que ocorre quando o utilizador move o rato dentro de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the left mouse button in a pressed state while a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> is moved by a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação mantém o botão esquerdo do rato num Estado premido enquanto um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>é movida por uma operação de arrastar e largar.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: This also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> to remain set to `true` when the mouse with its left mouse button pressed moves off the header.
trans-unit.target: Isto também faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>permaneça definido para `true` quando o rato com o botão esquerdo do rato premido move desativar o cabeçalho.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação mantém o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>definido para o argumento do evento `false` para o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>eventos, para que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método pode suportar a operação de arrastar e largar que se move de uma coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Responde a uma alteração na <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref> dimensões.

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Informações sobre a alteração do tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a função de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> class performs layout for the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and places an additional column header at the end to add space.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>classe efetua o esquema para os cabeçalhos de coluna num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>e coloca um cabeçalho de coluna adicionais no final para adicionar espaço.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: A Role value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> identifies this column header in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de função de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>identifica este cabeçalho de coluna no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>

trans-unit.source: A Role value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> identifies a column that is currently the object of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de função de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>identifica uma coluna que atualmente é o objeto de uma operação de arrastar e largar.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the current role of the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole"> </xref> valor de enumeração que especifica a função atual da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to serialize a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se deve ao serializar um <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method applies to the following dependency properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty>
trans-unit.target: Este método aplica-se às seguintes propriedades de dependência:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty>

trans-unit.source: The dependency property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de dependência.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref> must be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref> tem de ser serializado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
